attributes.action: force parents to pay to top up an income assessed student loan to the full amount.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the student loan company assess a student's income and their parent's income.  If they earn over a certain amount, then their loan is reduced.  Your parents must provide details of their income, so you can be assessed.  Hoever, there is no rule that says they have to pay any money what so ever, nor contribute to the student's living costs.
